The image was published on Facebook on J: 2019, and has been shared more than 47,000 times.
A reverse image search on Google found s: published on the official website for Ripleys, a US-based attractions franchise, in 2016. The caption of these photos credits Canadian artist Jeff de Boer as the creator of the armor.
Jeff de Boer: the artist credited with creating the armor, confirmed in an email to AFP that he did make the armor pictured in the social media posts for a Ripley's Believe It or Not! Museum in the US in 1992.
